title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Air Force Targets Terror Infrastructure in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

During the day, Air Force fighter jets, in collaboration with Division 210, targeted infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the village of Hamam, from which rockets were launched towards the Mount Dov area. Additionally, over the last 24 hours, the IDF attacked and eliminated a terrorist cell of the Hezbollah organization identified operating in the Mays al-Jabal area, alongside targeting additional terror infrastructure in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, about 20 launches were detected crossing from Lebanese territory, landing in an open area near the Guma junction. There were no casualties, and no alerts were activated according to policy. Just a few minutes after the launches were identified, Air Force fighter jets struck in the Hula area in southern Lebanon and destroyed the launcher from which the fire was initiated.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3WHnLAr
